arts.ttl: Monza vs Inter – Official Starting lineups as Nerazzurri miss 7 players
arts.sum: Monza face off against Inter in both teams’ final pre-season friendly before the 2025-26 season...

arts.ttl: How Inter Milan Will Line Up In Pre-Season Friendly Vs Monza – Dutch Wingback Set To Start
arts.sum: Inter Milan will face Monza in their second pre-season friendly later tonight. According to Tuttosport via FCInterNews, Denzel Dumfries will be part of Cristian Chivu’s starting line-up. Monza and Inter will lock horns in an exhibition match at Stadio Brianteo this evening. arts.ttl: Monza vs Inter: everything you need to know about the Nerazzurri friendly
arts.sum: The Nerazzurri will continue their pre-season with a match at the Stadio San Nicola in Bari against Olympiacos on Saturday 16 August, before their Serie A opener against Torino at San Siro on Monday 25 August. Third pre-season test for the team: kick-off is scheduled for Tuesday 12 August at 21:00 CEST, live on Sportitalia.

arts.ttl: Report – France U21 Star To Start For Inter Milan In Friendly Clash Vs Monza
arts.sum: Striker Ange-Yoan Bonny is set to start for Inter Milan in tomorrow’s friendly match against Monza. This according to Italian broadcaster Sky Sport Italia, via FCInterNews. Inter Milan will take on Monza in their penultimate friendly match of preseason tomorrow. The Nerazzurri have already faced Monaco in a warm-up match last week. arts.ttl: Report – Germany & Poland Stars To Be Fit For Inter Milan Vs Monza Friendly Clash
arts.sum: Yann Bisseck and Piotr Zielinski will be fit to return in Inter Milan’s friendly match against Monza tomorrow. This according to today’s print edition of Rome-based newspaper Corriere dello Sport, via FCInterNews. Inter Milan will take on Monza in their penultimate friendly match of preseason tomorrow.
